title: Stir fried seafood medley with tofu
ingredients: ['10-12 medium prawns, shelled and deveined', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'sesame oil, to taste', '8 medium scallops, halved', '1 (396g) block tofu, cubed', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 tablespoons chopped garlic', '8 baby sweetcorn, chopped', '4 crab flavoured seafood sticks, chopped', '100g frozen mixed vegetables', '400ml chicken stock', '4 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 4 tablespoons chicken stock', '1/3 teaspoon salt', '1 spring onion, finely chopped']
